stimulusHtml: The particular site shown was chosen, in part, to take advantage of

features.html:
The question refers to the image shown.

choicesHtml: the sun’s heat in the winter and the cliff’s shade in the summer
sight lines to other mountain peaks that were considered to be ancestral deities
natural rock outcroppings prevalent along the Pacific Northwest coast
the soft sandstone that was preferred for rock-cut structures
